title: Verify E-mail
code_label: Enter the verification code that was sent to your Email. If you can't find the E-mail, it may have fallen into the span box.

messages.resend_success_msg: A new verification code was sent to your E-mail! Please chack your inbox.
messages.invalid_code_msg: Verification code must be a 4 digit code!
messages.verified_email_msg: Your E-mail was successfully verified! Welcome to Playliter.
messages.code_not_found_msg: The inserted code is not the one sent to your E-mail. Please insert the correct one.
